name: Ça Va (?)
description:
Hello !

First game prototype that I share here, but also first project with such progress.

This is a school project to validate my year. At least, part of it.

Useful hints:

- keyboard + mouse to play;

- pay attention to the distance between the playable character and your cursor;

- There is no pause menu at the moment;

- During a level, press the "M" key to return to the Main Menu. On the other hand you lost the progress;

- Sorry, a large part is in French (texts and voices);

Your opinion matters a lot, especially to improve me. Thank you to those who will answer the form.
